headline: GTA Online
subtitle: GTA Online Bonuses this Week: Double GTA$ and RP Playlist (Sept 9 - 15)
content:
With the dog days of August now firmly in the rear-view and certain distinctly American sporting traditions kicking off in earnest, get into a special Double GTA$ & RP Playlist.

Kicking off today and running through Thursday, September 15th, earn Double GTA$ & RP in the latest Playlist featuring a trio of Adversary Modes that will have you fighting for field position in some of Los Santosâ€™ most vaunted venues.

Check out rockstargames.com/newswire for all the details.
